ol.li: Ribbon tabs: click to switch to a particular tab.
Ribbon panel: every tab contains several panels, which combine similar tools.
Mechanical browser: browse through a tree-like representation of your model, with the possibility to highlight a particular node in the model area and edit its mechanical properties.
Mechanical properties of a particular node: some are read-only. Check the properties of the root node in the tree.
Dockable tool panels: mechanical Browser and Library.
Quad cursor menu: apply a particular tool when you hover over an affected entity.
Command line: type in the command.
Status bar: status and switch hot options.
Properties panel: Adjust non-mechanical properties of selected entities, such as color and layer.
